entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is pinned against the wall by his classmates.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who comes running to restore silence and order in the scene. She uses her wand to set off a loud bang.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: A Hufflepuff student who arrives on the scene, panting, and accuses Harry of being caught in the act.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: A mischievous poltergeist who loves chaos and breaks into song to mock Harry.

entities.name: justin
entities.description: A student who is being examined by the teachers along with Nearly Headless Nick.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A ghost who is being examined by the teachers along with Justin.
